input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SCIENTIFIC AND ACADEMIC COMPUTER NETWORK - NATIONAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE. Summary: Delivery of the Dmz Firewall as Part of the Ccn Project. Description: 1. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery of nine brand new command and communication vehicles (company command posts). The subject of the order was divided into parts. The Ordering Party allows in accordance with Art. 91 section 1 of the Public Procurement Law folding partial offers. An offer may be submitted for one or two lots. The Ordering Party does not limit the number of parts of the contract for which an order may be awarded to one Contractor. Offers in each part of the order will be examined and assessed separately, i.e.: 1) Part A - delivery of 4 command and communication cars (company command posts), 2) Part B - delivery of 3 command and communication cars (company command posts). 3) Part C - delivery of 2 cars command and communications (company command posts). A detailed description and method of implementing individual parts of the order is included in the OPZ, i.e.: 1) for part A of the order in Annex No. 3A to the SWZ, 2) for part B of the order in Annex No. 3B to SWZ, 3) for part C of the order in Annex No. 3c to the SWZ. The Ordering Party envisages the use of the so-called reverse procedure referred to in Art. 139 section 1 of the Public Procurement Law, i.e. the Ordering Party will first examine and evaluate the offers, and then qualify them subjective evaluation of the Contractor whose offer was rated the highest, in terms of the lack of grounds for exclusion and the fulfillment of the conditions for participation in the proceedings. A detailed description of the subject of the order regarding the installation and system for detecting and neutralizing Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) is attached as Annex No. 3 to the SWZ. 4. Warranty terms: 4.1.Required minimum warranty period for components mechanical, electrical and electronic of the vehicle on which the body was built is 24 months with no mileage limit. 4.2. The required minimum warranty period for the paintwork of the vehicle on which the bodywork was made is 24 months. 4.3. Required period The warranty against perforation of the body parts of the vehicle on which the bodywork was made is 72 months. 4.4. The required minimum warranty period for the structure and equipment, including the Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) detection and neutralization system, is 24 months. 4.5. The beginning of the warranty period will be counted from the date of receipt of the subject of the order. 4.6. Technical parameters: 1. An electrically driven device, operating in semi-automatic or automatic mode, enabling filling flood bags with sand.2. Intended use: fast and effective filling of flood bags during rescue and protection activities.3. Adjustable dosing capacity, enabling precise filling of bags with sand weighing approximately 20 kg (for bags with approximate dimensions of 3035 6070 cm).4. The design of the device allows it to be transported: a) inside a passenger vehicle, or: b) in a version equipped with a hitch for transporting behind the vehicle (e.g. passenger car, light commercial vehicle).5. Device efficiency: minimum 700, preferably 9001000 bags per hour.6. Power supply: standard voltage 230 V. Published Date: 2025-12-12. Closing Date: 2025-12-19. Competition: ICB. BASIC PARAMETERS: The vehicle must meet Polish requirements road traffic regulations, taking into account the requirements regarding emergency vehicles, in accordance with the Act of June 20, 1997, Road Traffic Law (Journal of Laws of 2021, item 450, as amended), along with implementing regulations. Description: Part 1 - Purchase of a power generator and central UPS together with the reconstruction of the electrical installation. The Ordering Party commissions and the Contractor accepts the execution of a public procurement, the subject of which is the supply of infrastructure for the commune of Brzesko in order to create a safe, integrated and efficient IT environment that will ensure business continuity, data protection and fast and secure access to key information resources. The main aspects of the environment will include securing the network against threats, monitoring incidents, managing access to resources and protecting against data leakage, which will enable monitoring and management of infrastructures in real time and will guarantee the security of critical data of citizens and the office. instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: DISTRICT SPORTS CENTER IN BEŁCHATOW. Summary: 2026 - Water Rescue Services in the Indoor Swimming Pool of the District Sports Center in Bełchatow. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of water rescue services at the swimming pool of the District Sports Center in Bechatow. Located in Bechatow at 96 Czapliniecka Street, hereinafter referred to as Pywalnia. In particular, the order concerns the performance of rescue duties at the PCS Swimming Pool during its opening hours and permanent observation of the pool basin with dimensions: length 25 m, width 12.5 m, five lanes, depth variable from 0.90 m to 1.60 m. Rescue service will be provided 7 days a week, i.e. every day from 6:45 a.m. to 10:00 p.m., excluding: Easter (from Holy Saturday to the Second Day of Easter), Corpus Christi, August 15, November 1, Christmas Eve and Christmas Day and planned technical breaks of max. 14 days. A detailed description and method of order execution is included in the Description of the Subject of the Order (OPZ), constituting Appendix No. 1 to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-28. Closing Date: 2025-12-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: 2026 - Water Rescue Services in the Indoor Swimming Pool of the District Sports Center in Bełchatow
output.Description: The subject of the order is the provision of water rescue services at the swimming pool of the District Sports Center in Bechatow. Located in Bechatow at 96 Czapliniecka Street, hereinafter referred to as Pywalnia. In particular, the order concerns the performance of rescue duties at the PCS Swimming Pool during its opening hours and permanent observation of the pool basin with dimensions: length 25 m, width 12.5 m, five lanes, depth variable from 0.90 m to 1.60 m. A detailed description and method of order execution is included in the Description of the Subject of the Order (OPZ), constituting Appendix No. 1 to SWZ.

Summary: Providing Comprehensive Water Rescue Services for the Aquastar Swimming Pool at Ul. Szczecińska 35 in Stargard in 2026 - 2027. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of comprehensive water rescue services for the AquaStar swimming pool at ul. Szczeciska 35 in Stargard in the years 2026 - 2027. The Contractor's obligations include ensuring the safety of people using the AquaStar swimming pool in accordance with applicable legal regulations, and in particular: 1) Act of August 18, 2011 on the safety of persons staying in water areas (Journal of Laws of 2023, item 714, as amended), 2) Regulation of the Minister of Interior and Administration of January 23, 2012 on the minimum requirements regarding the number of water rescuers ensuring constant control of the designated water area (Journal of Laws of 2022, item 1981, as amended),3) Regulation of the Minister of Internal Affairs of February 27, 2012 on the requirements for equipping designated water areas with rescue and auxiliary equipment, signaling devices and warning signs and medical equipment, medicines and sanitary articles (Journal of Laws of 2022, item 1607, as amended). input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GORA COMMUNE. Summary: Delivery of Devices under the Civil Protection and Civil Defense Program - Group A. Description: The Ordering Party requires that the delivery includes a positive pressure breathing apparatus for respiratory protection, complete with a full-face mask, a height-adjustable backrest and an integrated breathing apparatus, as well as a composite compressed air cylinder with a capacity of 6.8 liters and a working pressure of 300 bar, equipped with in the valve with an outflow limiter. The harness is required to have padded S-shaped shoulder straps, a hip belt and frame transferring weight to the hips, and a single-handed height adjustment, and hoses to be routed in frame tunnels to reduce the risk of snagging; application is expected reflective elements improving visibility. The entire device should be capable of being washed by machine (without the need to disassemble it), with dust- and water-resistant harness materials, and the weight of the carrying set (without the cylinder) should not exceed 4 kg. The device must meet the requirements of the EN 137 standard and is ATEX approved categories at least II 1G IIC T6 and II 1D IIIC with an operating temperature range from 30 C to +60 C. A warranty for the main components is expected of 10 years. Additionally, compatibility with a lightweight set is required communication.... Published Date: 2025-11-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-01. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Delivery of Devices under the Civil Protection and Civil Defense Program - Group A

The harness is required to have padded S-shaped shoulder straps, a hip belt and frame transferring weight to the hips, and a single-handed height adjustment, and hoses to be routed in frame tunnels to reduce the risk of snagging; application is expected reflective elements improving visibility. The entire device should be capable of being washed by machine (without the need to disassemble it), with dust- and water-resistant harness materials, and the weight of the carrying set (without the cylinder) should not exceed 4 kg. The device must meet the requirements of the EN 137 standard and is ATEX approved categories at least II 1G IIC T6 and II 1D IIIC with an operating temperature range from 30 C to +60 C. A warranty for the main components is expected of 10 years. Additionally, compatibility with a lightweight set is required communication...
output.Sub_Sector: Security, Fire Fighting, Police and Defence

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: DISTRICT SPORTS CENTER IN BEŁCHATÓW. Summary: 2026 - Water Rescue Services in the Indoor Swimming Pool of the District Sports Center in Bełchatów. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of water rescue services at the swimming pool of the District Sports Center in Bechatów. Located in Bechatów at 96 Czapliniecka Street, hereinafter referred to as Pywalnia. In particular, the order concerns performing rescue duties at the Swimming Pool PCS during its opening hours and constant observation of the swimming pool basin with dimensions: length 25 m, width 12.5 m, five lanes, depth variable from 0.90 m to 1.60 m. Rescue service will be provided 7 days a week, i.e. every day from 6:45 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. excluding: Easter (from Holy Saturday to the Second Day of Easter), Corpus Christi, August 15, November 1, Christmas Eve and Christmas and planned technical breaks of max. 14 days. A detailed description and method of order fulfillment can be found in the Description Subject of the Order (OPZ), constituting Appendix No. 1 to the SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-19. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: EUROPEAN BORDER AND COAST GUARD AGENCY (FRONTEX). Summary: Shipborne Vtol Uas Deployment with Data Fusion and Integration Services. Description: The surveillance of the EU-s land and sea borders is a fundamental component of the European integrated Border Management (EIBM) as identified by the Multiannual Strategic Policy for EIBM 2023-2027 . Border surveillance requires effective operational measures taken by Frontex and Member States- border management authorities. The Technical and Operational Strategy for EIBM states that these measures should be intelligence-driven and risk-based, drawing on multi-domain sensor networks. The multipurpose surveillance-oriented approach, as described in the Capability Roadmap of the EBCG , will require the deployment of integrated, interoperable and inter-connected capabilities that will enable persistent border surveillance, including unmanned systems such as UAS and satellites. Integrated solution for border surveillance combining shipborne Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) with Vertical Take-off and Landing (VTOL) with data fusion and integration from additional sources has the objective to provide an enhanced level of detail and accuracy in understanding border activity, thereby enabling more effective surveillance and response. Based on operational capability requirements and previous research efforts, through this Pilot Project the Agency intends to continue evaluating unmanned systems technologies and their capabilities in delivering integrated aerial maritime surveillance, while assessing operational performance, cost-efficiency, and reliability. <br> Doc Title: Shipborne VT.... Published Date: 2025-11-19. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: European Border and Coast Guard Agency (Frontex)

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PRUSZKÓW COUNTY. Summary: Delivery of Rescue, Flood Protection and Evacuation Equipment for the Crisis Management Team in Pruszków, Divided into Parts.. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery of brand new rescue, flood protection and evacuation equipment from current production that meets the technical, functional and operational requirements indicated by the Ordering Party. The delivered equipment must be free from physical and legal defects. The equipment should be delivered with an operating manual in Polish. The equipment should be covered by the manufacturer's warranty, and in the absence of the manufacturer's warranty, the Contractor is obliged to cover the delivered equipment with a warranty for the period minimum 12 months from the date of delivery of the equipment. The delivered equipment should be originally packed by the manufacturer, and if it is necessary for the Contractor to interfere with the original packaging or device, its re-packaging should contain elements identifying the Contractor's interference, e.g. by sticking a tape with the Contractor's name or other identifying sticker in the opening places. The equipment must have appropriate certificates, approvals and permits for use and must comply with applicable regulations. standards. The delivery of equipment includes purchase, transport and delivery to the place indicated by the Ordering Party at the expense of the Contractor.... Published Date: 2025-11-15. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: DISTRICT HEADQUARTERS OF THE STATE FIRE SERVICE IN PRUSZCZ GDAŃSKI. Summary: Delivery of Special Clothes, Personal Protective Equipment, Uniforms and Service Uniforms for the District Headquarters of the State Fire Service in Pruszcz Gdański.. Description: Delivery to the State Fire Service District Headquarters in Pruszcz Gdaski of 10 sets of special clothing consisting of a jacket and trousers in accordance with the PN-EN 469, EN 1149-5, EN 1149-3 standards and a light jacket and trousers in accordance with the PN-EN 15614 standard, as well as 20 pieces of firefighter balaclavas and 20 pairs of special gloves, 10 pairs of gloves technical equipment, 10 pairs of rubber firefighter boots, 10 sets of flame-retardant thermoactive underwear. The offered clothes must have a valid certificate of approval for use, issued on the basis of the Regulation of the Minister of Interior and Administration of June 20, 2007 on the list of household products. ensuring public safety or protection of health, life and property, as well as the rules for issuing approvals for these products for use.. Summary: Comprehensive Water Rescue Services at the Indoor Swimming Pool "Aquarius" of the Myślenicki Culture and Sports Center in Myślenice at Ul. Ogrodowa 19 in the Period 1/01/2026-31/12/2026. Description: Detailed description of the subject of the order: The subject of the order is the provision of water rescue services by the Contractor in the Indoor Swimming Pool "Aquarius" of the Mylenicki Center for Culture and Sports (hereinafter referred to as the Swimming Pool), located at ul. Ogrodowa 19 in Mylenice (hereinafter: Services), in the period from January 1, 2026 to on December 31, 2026. By submitting the offer, the contractor undertakes to ensure continuous rescue service of the Swimming Pool during the term of the Agreement, 7 days a week, i.e. every day from 6.55 to 21.55 in shifts, according to the following rules: 1st shift: 6.55-14.25 (6.55-7.00 preparation swimming pools for work; 7.00-14.25 ensuring safety in the swimming pool area and transferring duty to the 2nd shift), 2nd shift: 14.25-21.55 (14.25-21.50 picking up the 1st shift and ensuring safety in the Swimming Pool area; 21.50-21.55 cleaning works in the Swimming Pool area) Within each shift, the Contractor ensure constant observation of the Swimming Pool and performance of Services by Three (3) lifeguards simultaneously (i.e. three (3) on the 1st shift and three (3) on the 2nd shift) A detailed description of the subject of the order is set out in Annex No. 2. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Comprehensive Water Rescue Services at the Indoor Swimming Pool "Aquarius" of the Myślenicki Culture and Sports Center in Myślenice at Ul. Ogrodowa 19 in the Period 1/01/2026-31/12/2026

Description: Purchase of a headquarters and command tent with equipment. The task includes the purchase of: 1) A pneumatic tent (1 piece) with an external area of ​​not less than 37 m2. The tent should have a steel structure and be inflated with air using a foot pump, an electric compressor or a compressed air cylinder. air, which allows its installation in various weather conditions. (within the minimum external temperature range from -30C to +55C). The materials from which the tent elements are made: pneumatic frame, roof and floor should be durable, abrasion-resistant, waterproof, gas-tight and non-flammable. A Velcro connection should be used between the frame and the cover.
